translation.en: -[Dad] Hello, Georgie. -Hi.
translation.zh: -嗨 乔琪 -嗨 （9岁）

translation.en: [Dad] How did you feel when you were younger,
translation.zh: 在你更小的时候 听到有人说

translation.en: when people would say, "What a beautiful boy," or… you know?
translation.zh: “这男孩真漂亮” 你是什么感受？

translation.en: I got a bit frustrated, um, because…
translation.zh: 我会有点沮丧因为…

translation.en: I… I wanted them to understand that I'm a girl.
translation.zh: 我想让他们明白 我是个女孩

translation.en: I'm a girl.
translation.zh: 我是个女孩

translation.en: Not… maybe not in the outside, but in the inside, I feel like a girl.
translation.zh: 也许外表不是 但我内心觉得自己是个女孩

translation.en: Do you wanna wear different trackie dacks?
translation.zh: 你想换套运动服吗？

translation.en: That's my fault.
translation.zh: 是我的错

translation.en: They're longer on me than they are on you. [laughs]
translation.zh: 我穿的时候没这么短

translation.en: [Georgie] Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Yeah, wear your nice blue ones.
translation.zh: 对 穿你蓝色的那套

translation.en: -I'll bring these ones instead. Yeah. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -我带这套吧 -嗯

translation.en: It's very surreal for me to think that for most of today, I'll be asleep.
translation.zh: 想到我今天大部分时间都会沉睡 感觉很超现实

translation.en: [Mum] Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: [Georgie] And I keep thinking of the moments that have led me here.
translation.zh: 我一直在想 带我一步一步走到这里的那些瞬间

translation.en: [Mum] Yeah.
translation.zh: 嗯

translation.en: [Mum] Pop that next to your bed.
translation.zh: 把这个放到床边

translation.en: I'll pop that in there, just in case you need it.
translation.zh: 这个我放进去 可能用得着

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Today is your first day of school.
translation.zh: 今天是你第一天上学

translation.en: Can we see you in your uniform, please?
translation.zh: 我们能看看你穿校服的样子吗？ （5岁）

translation.en: Uh, yeah. Uh, Valks…
translation.zh: 好呀 瓦尔克斯…

translation.en: [Georgie] Yeah, and mine too.
translation.zh: 我的也是

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah. Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: The most recent swimming carnival at Valkstone
translation.zh: 最近瓦尔克斯顿的游泳嘉年华

translation.en: was very…
translation.zh: 非常…

translation.en: very frustrating.
translation.zh: 令人沮丧

translation.en: I went into the boy's cubicles,
translation.zh: 我走进男孩的更衣室

translation.en: or toilets, to get, um, changed into…
translation.zh: 厕所去换成…

translation.en: changed, um,
translation.zh: 换衣服

translation.en: when all the boys started laughing at me.
translation.zh: 然后男孩们都开始嘲笑我

translation.en: And then I hid in the cubicle.
translation.zh: 然后我躲进了小隔间

translation.en: And then…
translation.zh: 然后…

translation.en: my mum thought that maybe I'll get dressed with her
translation.zh: 我妈妈觉得 也许我可以和她一起换衣服

translation.en: but not in any of the toilets.
translation.zh: 但不在厕所附近

translation.en: We'll get dressed behind the toilets,
translation.zh: 我们在厕所后面更衣

translation.en: where no one could find us.
translation.zh: 没人能看到我们

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: So I would like to introduce to you the college captains of 2018,
translation.zh: 我想向大家介绍2018年的学生代表

translation.en: D'Art and Georgie.
translation.zh: 达特和乔琪

translation.en: [Dad] How do you feel about having a sister and not a brother?
translation.zh: 你觉得有个姐姐 而不是哥哥 感觉如何？

translation.en: Well, it is quite fun because if we were younger,
translation.zh: 很好玩 因为在我们小时候

translation.en: we can be playing superheroes or something.
translation.zh: 我们会扮演超级英雄

translation.en: -[Georgie cheers] -A girl superhero and a boy superhero.
translation.zh: 一个女超级英雄和一个男超级英雄

translation.en: Now we usually play spies,
translation.zh: 现在我们经常扮演间谍

translation.en: and there's a woman agent and a man agent.
translation.zh: 女特工和男特工

translation.en: So it's more fun having a girl around instead of just two boys.
translation.zh: 所以有个女孩一起玩 比两个男孩一起玩更有意思

translation.en: [Dad] How do you find them at school?
translation.zh: 学校里的小朋友呢？

translation.en: Does everyone at school think of her as a girl? Yeah.
translation.zh: -大家都把她当女生看吗？ -对

translation.en: I crossed my heart that I wouldn't tell anyone.
translation.zh: 我发誓我不会告诉任何人

translation.en: [Beck] And now one, just the twins.
translation.zh: 现在 双胞胎一起拍一张

translation.en: -How are you feeling, love? -I'm good.
translation.zh: -你感觉如何 宝贝？ -我很好

translation.en: [Beck] Be careful.
translation.zh: 小心点

translation.en: Who's taking the coffee machine when Dad moves out?
translation.zh: 爸爸搬出去之后 咖啡机归谁？

translation.en: I get all the tea stuff, and he gets all the coffee stuff.
translation.zh: 茶具都归我 咖啡的都归他

translation.en: -The microwave? -[Beck] Staying here.
translation.zh: -微波炉呢？ -留在这儿

translation.en: The Wi-Fi?
translation.zh: 无线网络呢？

translation.en: [Beck] I don't know 'cause we might go with another company.
translation.zh: 不知道 我们可能会换家公司

translation.en: The phone?
translation.zh: 电话呢？

translation.en: Stays here.
translation.zh: 留在这里

translation.en: And it might… have a little bit of a different vibe here,
translation.zh: 这里的气氛可能有点不同

translation.en: but we're good at creating homes, Georgie.
translation.zh: 但我们很擅长制造家的气息

translation.en: [Greg] Love you so much, darling.
translation.zh: 我非常爱你 宝贝

translation.en: We'll all be here waiting for you when you come out.
translation.zh: 你出来的时候 我们都会在这里等你

translation.en: Yep.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: [Beck] Time to go, my love.
translation.zh: 该走了 亲爱的

translation.en: Can I come a little way with her?
translation.zh: 我能陪她走一段吗？

translation.en: -Love you. -[nurse] Yes.
translation.zh: 爱你

translation.en: -See ya. Have fun. -[Georgie] Love you.
translation.zh: 一会儿见 玩得开心

translation.en: [nurse] Come inside. It gets cold in there.
translation.zh: 进来吧

translation.en: [nurse] I'm just gonna connect a few of these.
translation.zh: 让我连接几组仪器

translation.en: It just monitors your heart throughout the procedure.
translation.zh: 会在手术全程监测你的心跳

translation.en: And we're coming in today for gender affirmation surgery?
translation.zh: 我们今天来做性别确认手术？

translation.en: Everyone in agreeance?
translation.zh: 大家都同意吗？

translation.en: -[all] Yeah. -[nurse] Thank you.
translation.zh: -对 -谢谢

translation.en: I'm just gonna give you a little oxygen before you're going off to sleep.
translation.zh: 在你沉睡前 我给你一些氧气

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: [nurse] So just take some nice, big deep breaths for me there.
translation.zh: 慢慢深呼吸几次

translation.en: [presenter] And the winner of the Young People's Human Rights Medal
translation.zh: 2017年澳洲青年人权勋章奖的得主是

translation.en: for 2017 is Georgie Stone.
translation.zh: 2017年澳洲青年人权勋章奖的得主是 乔琪斯通

translation.en: It is an honor to be receiving this award today.
translation.zh: 天啊 能获得这个奖项是我的荣幸

translation.en: A few months ago,
translation.zh: 几个月前

translation.en: I was talking to a group of trans kids between the ages of 8 and 12,
translation.zh: 我和一群八到十二岁的 跨性别孩子交流

translation.en: and I was shocked to learn that every single one of them was,
translation.zh: 我震惊地发现 他们中每一个

translation.en: at that time, being bullied at school.
translation.zh: 都在学校被霸凌

translation.en: So even though we have achieved a lot, we still need to make sure
translation.zh: 尽管我们取得了很多成就 我们得确定

translation.en: that we are protecting and looking after trans kids in Australia.
translation.zh: 我们有在保护并照顾 澳大利亚的跨性别孩子

translation.en: [Greg] How do you feel about the medical treatment
translation.zh: 你对你想要接受的药物治疗

translation.en: that you want to have?
translation.zh: 有什么感觉？

translation.en: I feel good about that.
translation.zh: 我感觉很好

translation.en: [Greg] Why?
translation.zh: 为什么？

translation.en: Well, because then… then I won't grow into a boy. I'll…
translation.zh: 那样我就不会长成男孩 我会…

translation.en: I'll be myself.
translation.zh: 变成自己

translation.en: [interviewer] Michelle. Okay, great.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: So, Michelle, can you say your name for me
translation.zh: 米歇尔 你可以说出你的名字

translation.en: and your, um, position?
translation.zh: 和职位吗？

translation.en: My name is Associate Professor Michelle Telfer,
translation.zh: 我是副教授米歇尔泰芙

translation.en: and I'm the head of Department of Adolescent Medicine
translation.zh: 皇家儿童医院青少年医疗部主任

translation.en: and director of the Gender Service at the Royal Children's Hospital.
translation.zh: 以及性别健康中心主任

translation.en: For every young person who comes to see us,
translation.zh: 每个来我们这里就诊的年轻人

translation.en: there's a very thorough assessment that takes place
translation.zh: 我们都会在做出重大决定前 比如

translation.en: before a big decision like hormone treatment
translation.zh: 开展激素疗法

translation.en: is… is decided upon.
translation.zh: 对其进行全面评估

translation.en: But even with this thorough process,
translation.zh: 但即使有我们全面的评估

translation.en: for many, many years in Australia, young people had to go to court
translation.zh: 这么多年来 澳大利亚年轻人不得不上法庭

translation.en: to access the treatment they needed.
translation.zh: 才能得到接受治疗的权力

translation.en: When Georgie was 13,
translation.zh: 乔琪13岁时

translation.en: she and her family decided to challenge that.
translation.zh: 她和她的家人决定挑战现实

translation.en: To have a complete stranger having to make a decision about my body
translation.zh: 让一个陌生人决定 我该如何处置自己的身体

translation.en: was really distressing, and I felt really powerless.
translation.zh: 真的令人苦恼 我感觉很无力

translation.en: So we appealed to change both Stage 1 and Stage 2 treatments
translation.zh: 所以我们上诉 要求改变第一第二阶段治疗的程序

translation.en: so, um, trans kids and their families wouldn't have to go to court.
translation.zh: 让跨性别孩子及其家人不必上法庭

translation.en: And we won, but it was only a partial victory.
translation.zh: 我们赢了 但只是部分胜利

translation.en: So they, uh… they changed the law surrounding Stage 1,
translation.zh: 他们改变了第一阶段治疗的相关法律

translation.en: so then, um, families didn't have to go to court for Stage 1 treatment,
translation.zh: 这些家庭不必由法院判决 就能接受第一阶段的治疗

translation.en: but the law still stood for Stage 2.
translation.zh: 可是 第二阶段治疗的法律仍然没变

translation.en: So what it meant for me was that I did have to go back to court,
translation.zh: 所以对我来说 我还是得回到法庭

translation.en: and that was really scary.
translation.zh: 那真的很可怕

translation.en: I can't get, um, female hormones without the permission of court.
translation.zh: 未经法庭许可 我就无法获得女性荷尔蒙

translation.en: They give the order, and it's not in the power of the doctors,
translation.zh: 由他们下令裁决 而不是医生

translation.en: the parents, or me.
translation.zh: 父母或我

translation.en: I don't have, legally, the right to make that decision.
translation.zh: 法律上 我无权做出这个决定

translation.en: I need to…
translation.zh: 我需要…

translation.en: um, they needed to determine whether I was Gillick competent,
translation.zh: 他们得确定我是否有吉利克能力

translation.en: which means I know what the effects will be.
translation.zh: 也就是 我是否清楚对我产生的影响

translation.en: I need the estrogen tablets. I need to go through female puberty.
translation.zh: 我需要雌激素片 我要经历女性青春期

translation.en: I get boobs. [laughs] I get, um, curves, you know,
translation.zh: 我会有胸部 有曲线

translation.en: things that girls have, and I need it.
translation.zh: 有女孩有的东西 我需要这些

translation.en: I need it to be myself,
translation.zh: 我需要这些才能做自己

translation.en: and if I don't get it, I'm not gonna be happy.
translation.zh: 如果我没有 我不会开心的

translation.en: I'm not gonna be myself.
translation.zh: 我就做不了我自己

translation.en: I've got a pimple…
translation.zh: 我长了个痘痘

translation.en: which is… I'm actually happy about,
translation.zh: 其实 我蛮开心的

translation.en: sort of.
translation.zh: 有点

translation.en: It means that the tablets are working, and I'm…
translation.zh: 这说明药片有用

translation.en: Uh, well, it's working. [laughs] Yay.
translation.zh: 真的有用 耶

translation.en: Firstly, kinda like to say thank you so much for having us. Um…
translation.zh: 首先 我想感谢各位邀请我们

translation.en: So thankful that I'm able to speak today, and hopefully we can do some good.
translation.zh: 我特别感激今天发言的机会 希望我们能促成一些好事

translation.en: Okay, so, my name is Georgie Stone. I'm 15 years old.
translation.zh: 好 我叫乔琪斯通 今年15岁

translation.en: Last year, we had to apply to the Family Court of Australia
translation.zh: 去年 我们不得不 向澳大利亚家庭法院申请

translation.en: to obtain Stage 2 treatment, which is cross-sex hormones.
translation.zh: 获得第二阶段的治疗 也就是跨性别荷尔蒙

translation.en: For the last five years,
translation.zh: 过去五年中

translation.en: court has played a big part in my family's life.
translation.zh: 法院极大影响了我的家庭生活

translation.en: At times, it overshadowed everything else.
translation.zh: 有时甚至盖过了一切

translation.en: I want to make sure this doesn't play the same part in anyone else's life.
translation.zh: 我想确保 这种事不会在其他人的人生中发生

translation.en: The court process is slow, biology is fast.
translation.zh: 法庭程序很慢 而发育很快

translation.en: The lives of trans kids are challenging at every turn.
translation.zh: 跨性别儿童的生活处处充满挑战

translation.en: As parents, we walk ahead of our child, almost like a landmine detector,
translation.zh: 身为父母 我们走在孩子前面 像地雷探测器一样

translation.en: sweeping the terrain before us, paving a safe pathway for them.
translation.zh: 为他们扫除前路的障碍 开辟安全的道路

translation.en: Most parents exhaust themselves creating a safe place at school,
translation.zh: 多数家长为了在学校 给孩子安全的空间 教育家人和朋友

translation.en: educating family and friends,
translation.zh: 殚精竭虑

translation.en: often being accused of causing it in the first place or of child abuse.
translation.zh: 而他们常常被指责造成孩子困扰 涉嫌虐待儿童

translation.en: Dealing with their own feelings of being overwhelmed and isolated,
translation.zh: 他们得处理 自己不知所措和孤立无援的感受

translation.en: finding appropriate medical support, family breakdown, kids harming themselves.
translation.zh: 找到合适的医疗支持 应对家庭崩溃 阻止孩子伤害自己

translation.en: The pressure is enormous and relentless.
translation.zh: 这种压力是巨大的 持续不断的

translation.en: To add court to this already intensely challenging situation
translation.zh: 在此巨大的挑战之上加入法庭程序

translation.en: is unnecessary and cruel.
translation.zh: 既无必要又残忍

translation.en: Legislation through Parliament is our last hope,
translation.zh: 通过议会推动立法是我们最后的希望

translation.en: so please help us.
translation.zh: 所以请帮助我们

translation.en: [Greg] How did you feel when you went to see Dr. Paul?
translation.zh: 你去看保罗医生时感觉如何？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 嗯

translation.en: After Dr. Paul, I felt much happier, much more safe.
translation.zh: 看保罗医生后 我觉得快乐多了 感觉更安全了

translation.en: [Greg] You didn't feel safe before that?
translation.zh: 你之前觉得不安全吗？

translation.en: Well…
translation.zh: 嗯…

translation.en: Well, no,
translation.zh: 不觉得

translation.en: 'cause not… not that many people understood about me.
translation.zh: 因为没有很多人理解我

translation.en: [Dr. Telfer] Are you happy to talk about the estrogen today and how that's going?
translation.zh: 今天你能谈谈雌激素的情况吗？

translation.en: Last time I saw you, we increased the dose.
translation.zh: 你上次就诊 我们增加了剂量

translation.en: Yeah, two milligrams.
translation.zh: 对 两毫克

translation.en: -[Dr. Telfer] Yeah, how's that going? -It's been good.
translation.zh: -对 感觉如何？ -挺好的

translation.en: I mean, I do notice I get a bit more annoyed at my parents than before.
translation.zh: 我注意到我对父母比以前更不耐烦了

translation.en: -Can you tell? -[Beck] No.
translation.zh: -你有感觉吗？ -没有

translation.en: And even if you were, I don't think I'd take a blind bit of notice.
translation.zh: 即使你真的有 我也完全没有注意到

translation.en: -Oh, good. -[Beck] So--
translation.zh: -那就好 -所以…

translation.en: Okay, so next time, you might get a little bit of sassiness.
translation.zh: 下次你可能会感受到一点冲撞

translation.en: Will… will you mind? Okay, that's fine.
translation.zh: 你介意吗？好 没事

translation.en: [Beck] All I notice is that you are feeling good about yourself,
translation.zh: 我只注意到你对自己感觉良好

translation.en: and that because you're feeling good about yourself,
translation.zh: 因为你感觉良好

translation.en: your focus is very positive on other things
translation.zh: 你对其他事情的反馈很积极

translation.en: and that you're determined to make the best life for yourself.
translation.zh: 你下定决心要让自己过上最好的生活

translation.en: A lot of our work has revolved around law reform for trans kids,
translation.zh: 我们的很多工作都围绕着 针对跨性别儿童的法律改革

translation.en: 'cause they have to apply to the Family Court of Australia -Right. -[Georgie] …to access treatment.
translation.zh: 因为他们必须向家庭法院申请 才能得到治疗

translation.en: Yeah. Great.
translation.zh: 嗯 很好

translation.en: You've got a way to go with trans awareness, do you think?
translation.zh: 你对提高社会对跨性别者的关注 很有一套 对吧？

translation.en: [Georgie] This isn't really a new issue, but in the public eye, it is.
translation.zh: 这不算是新问题 但对于公众来说 还是新的

translation.en: So there is a long way to go making sure we battle the social stigma,
translation.zh: 所以要打破深入人心的社会污名

translation.en: um, which is ingrained in our society.
translation.zh: 还有很长的路要走

translation.en: Hey, so, update.
translation.zh: 嘿 更新一下

translation.en: I'm gonna talk a little bit about boys.
translation.zh: 我想聊聊谈谈男孩的事

translation.en: Okay, so I've had a crush on this guy for about ten months,
translation.zh: 我暗恋一个男生10个月了

translation.en: big crush, um,
translation.zh: 超级喜欢他

translation.en: and turns out he had a crush on my best friend.
translation.zh: 结果发现他暗恋我最好的朋友

translation.en: [Dr. Telfer] Uh, it's nearly three years, isn't it?
translation.zh: 快三年了 是吧？

translation.en: Having estrogen before you're even looking at having
translation.zh: 在你考虑重大手术之前

translation.en: any of those sort of major surgical procedures.
translation.zh: 在你考虑重大手术之前 接受激素治疗

translation.en: I can… I can do it.
translation.zh: 我可以的

translation.en: My teachers all support me, and why shouldn't I do it?
translation.zh: 我的老师都支持我 我为何不做？

translation.en: I've waited so long.
translation.zh: 我等了很久

translation.en: [Dr. Telfer] Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: -And at 18, you're an adult. -[Georgie] Yeah.
translation.zh: -到了18岁 你就成年了 -对

translation.en: You can make those decisions, and clearly you've got the ability
translation.zh: 你可以做这些决定 显然 你也有能力

translation.en: to… to make a really good, informed decision, and it's totally up to you.
translation.zh: 做出明智的决定 所以完全取决于你

translation.en: [Georgie] So, yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: [Georgie] Going into the clinic today,
translation.zh: 我今天去诊所的路上

translation.en: I started thinking, "Okay, this is gonna happen."
translation.zh: 我开始想：“好 真的要发生了”

translation.en: -This is happening. -[Beck] Yeah, I know. I know.
translation.zh: -真的要发生了 -我知道

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Really, the meaning of it is all… you.
translation.zh: 全部的意义都是…你

translation.en: [Georgie] Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: [Beck] It's nobody else.
translation.zh: 没有其他人了

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: I have my feelings about it because I want you to be…
translation.zh: 我有自己的想法 因为我希望你成为…

translation.en: who you want to be, and I want you to be safe.
translation.zh: 你想成为的人 我想要你安全

translation.en: [Beck] But…
translation.zh: 但是…

translation.en: it's… it's just you.
translation.zh: 这只关乎你

translation.en: It's just for you.
translation.zh: 只是你的事

translation.en: I don't want it to change things though.
translation.zh: 我不想让它改变任何事

translation.en: [tearfully] I don't want to be trans.
translation.zh: 我不想做跨性别者

translation.en: But it is who I am, so I can't really…
translation.zh: 但这就是我 我没法…

translation.en: I try not to think about, "Oh, I wish I wasn't trans."
translation.zh: 我尽量不去想： “我不是跨性别就好了”

translation.en: I am trans, and I have to live with it.
translation.zh: 我是跨性别者 我必须接受

translation.en: And I will have to live with it all my life.
translation.zh: 我这辈子都得和这个身份共处

translation.en: I don't want this operation to change anything
translation.zh: 我不希望手术改变任何事

translation.en: 'cause I'm really happy.
translation.zh: 因为我真的很快乐

translation.en: And, yeah, I don't have the body that I want,
translation.zh: 没错 我没有我想要的身体

translation.en: but I'm still female.
translation.zh: 但我还是女性

translation.en: And I just don't want this operation to change who I am.
translation.zh: 我不希望这次手术改变我的身份

translation.en: Obviously, I want it to change my body, but I don't want it…
translation.zh: 显然 我想改变我的身体 但我不想…

translation.en: I don't want it to change people's perceptions of me.
translation.zh: 我不想它改变人们对我的看法

translation.en: I don't want it to change how I live my life and…
translation.zh: 我不想让它改变我的生活方式…

translation.en: [sniffles] I still want to be Georgie.
translation.zh: 我还想做乔琪

translation.en: [Greg] Sweetie.
translation.zh: 亲爱的

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: [Beck] You've had a lovely sleep.
translation.zh: 你好好睡了一觉

translation.en: -[weakly] I'm tired. -[Beck] Mmm.
translation.zh: 我累了

translation.en: [Greg] You just keep sleeping as long as you like.
translation.zh: 你想睡多久就睡多久

translation.en: [Beck] Okay. And is Justice Thackray
translation.zh: 好 萨克雷法官会

translation.en: going to deliver that from court
translation.zh: 在法庭上还是办公室

translation.en: or in chambers or…
translation.zh: 宣布…

translation.en: The judgment is gonna be handed down tomorrow at midday.
translation.zh: 判决将在明天中午宣判

translation.en: -Wow. -[Beck] Mmm…
translation.zh: 哇

translation.en: It could all be over tomorrow.
translation.zh: 明天可能一切就结束了

translation.en: That's crazy. It's like all that work,
translation.zh: 太疯狂了 所有的努力

translation.en: everything is leading up to tomorrow.
translation.zh: 都会在明天见分晓

translation.en: [Beck] That would mean a whole bunch of our friends
translation.zh: 那意味着我们的很多朋友

translation.en: wouldn't have to go through it. The kids wouldn't have to go through it.
translation.zh: 都不必经历这一切了 孩子们不必经历这一切了

translation.en: [Georgie] My family and I were able to reform Stage 1, so we didn't have to go to court,
translation.zh: 我的家人和我成功改革了第一阶段 这样我们就不必上法庭

translation.en: but you still have to for Stage 2.
translation.zh: 但第二阶段还是得上法庭

translation.en: Stage 2 treatment is cross-sex hormones.
translation.zh: 第二阶段疗程是跨性别荷尔蒙

translation.en: That's beginning the puberty that you want to undertake.
translation.zh: 就是你想要经历的青春期的开端

translation.en: And this treatment for trans kids is vital for our mental health,
translation.zh: 这个疗程对跨性别儿童的 心理健康和身体健康

translation.en: for our physical health.
translation.zh: 是至关重要的

translation.en: We really need this treatment.
translation.zh: 我们真的需要这个疗程

translation.en: My mum and I and lots of people
translation.zh: 我妈妈和我 还有很多人

translation.en: have been rallying support for this cause to get this process out of the courts.
translation.zh: 都在为让这一疗程不受法庭干扰 争取支持

translation.en: And hopefully, all that work has paid off.
translation.zh: 希望所有努力都能有回报

translation.en: -We'll see. -[reporter] We'll see.
translation.zh: -等着瞧 -等着瞧

translation.en: [Dr. Telfer] We won!
translation.zh: 我们赢了！

translation.en: [Beck] Oh my God.
translation.zh: 我的天

translation.en: -[Dr. Telfer] Congratulations. -[crying softly]
translation.zh: 恭喜

translation.en: Congratulations.
translation.zh: 恭喜

translation.en: [friend] The world's changing, hey?
translation.zh: 世界在改变

translation.en: Oh, darling girl.
translation.zh: 亲爱的姑娘

translation.en: [whispers] We won.
translation.zh: 我们赢了

translation.en: Can't believe it. [sobs]
translation.zh: 真不敢相信

translation.en: -[cork pops] -Oh jeez!
translation.zh: 天啊！

translation.en: And to all of you for looking after our kids,
translation.zh: 照顾我们的孩子的所有人

translation.en: thank you, thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你们

translation.en: For the next ten, twenty, thirty years,
translation.zh: 接下来的十、二十、三十年

translation.en: we will see young people benefit from this,
translation.zh: 我们会看到年轻人从中受益

translation.en: and… I suspect that
translation.zh: 我怀疑…

translation.en: those young people won't understand what you've been through
translation.zh: 那些年轻人不会理解你经历了什么

translation.en: and won't understand the significance of that freedom
translation.zh: 不会理解这种自由的重大意义

translation.en: that they have to just access the treatment they need,
translation.zh: 他们需要的治疗都能得到了

translation.en: but we will always remember
translation.zh: 但我们会永远记得

translation.en: that, Georgie, it was you
translation.zh: 乔琪 是你

translation.en: that fought this first.
translation.zh: 争取来的

translation.en: [tearfully] Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: -[woman 1] Cheers. -[woman 2] Cheers.
translation.zh: -干杯 -干杯

translation.en: [Georgie] Over this past week,
translation.zh: 在过去的一周里

translation.en: I… I was scared.
translation.zh: 我很害怕

translation.en: -[Beck] Mmm. -How I couldn't move my legs.
translation.zh: 我的腿动弹不得

translation.en: Um, couldn't get out of the bed, feeling trapped in there,
translation.zh: 我下不了床 感觉被困在此地

translation.en: feeling sick a lot of the time.
translation.zh: 经常觉得生病了

translation.en: It was just there were so many things happening to my body.
translation.zh: 我的身体正在经历很多事

translation.en: All because of this operation that I wanted.
translation.zh: 都是因为我想要的这个手术

translation.en: Um, I started a little bit to resent… resent it,
translation.zh: 我开始有点怨恨

translation.en: or scared of resenting it,
translation.zh: 或是害怕怨恨它

translation.en: which is probably the truth.
translation.zh: 这可能是事实

translation.en: I was scared of resenting this thing that I wanted,
translation.zh: 我害怕怨恨自己想要的东西

translation.en: but… what made me so happy this morning,
translation.zh: 但是… 我今天早上非常开心的是

translation.en: when… when my dressing came off
translation.zh: 揭掉敷料的时候

translation.en: and I saw my vagina for the first time,
translation.zh: 我第一次看到自己的阴道

translation.en: is that when I saw it, I didn't hate it.
translation.zh: 我看到的时候 我一点也不讨厌它

translation.en: Um, I loved it. And I said, "That's my vagina."
translation.zh: 我很喜欢它 我说：“那是我的阴道”

translation.en: And I really loved it.
translation.zh: 我真的很喜欢

translation.en: Uh, swollen, stitches, all of it.
translation.zh: 肿起来的缝针处 全都喜欢

translation.en: You know.
translation.zh: 你知道

translation.en: It didn't matter.
translation.zh: 没关系的

translation.en: -[Beck] Mmm. -I still loved it.
translation.zh: 我还是很喜欢

translation.en: I might try acting, so I'm doing drama classes.
translation.zh: 我可能会尝试表演 所以我在上戏剧课

translation.en: I would love to play a trans person in a film about
translation.zh: 我很想在跨性别主题的电影里

translation.en: all trans topics and make it realistic.
translation.zh: 饰演跨性别者 如实演绎

translation.en: [writer] Welcome.
translation.zh: 欢迎

translation.en: [Georgie] Thank you very much.
translation.zh: 非常感谢

translation.en: We're really, really excited to tell the story, and, uh, this is, um, the Neighbours story team.
translation.zh: 我们很期待讲述这个故事 这是《家有芳邻》的编剧团队

translation.en: So we just wanted to kind of get your guidance
translation.zh: 我们想让你来指导我们

translation.en: to what is appropriate and what isn't appropriate. Yeah.
translation.zh: 分辨什么是合适 什么是不合适的

translation.en: So, "transgender," is that an okay term?
translation.zh: “跨性别者” 这个术语没问题吗？

translation.en: -[Georgie] Transgender is the term. -Is the correct…
translation.zh: -跨性别者是正确的词 -是正确…

translation.en: [Georgie] Or trans.
translation.zh: 或说跨性别

translation.en: In terms of pronouns, she, her.
translation.zh: 在代词方面 她 她的

translation.en: -[writer] Yeah. -Very simple.
translation.zh: -对 -很简单

translation.en: Obviously, when you meet new people, and they just know you as Georgie…
translation.zh: 当你遇到新人时 他们认识的是乔琪

translation.en: [Georgie] Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: …when they eventually or if they eventually learn
translation.zh: 当他们最终了解到

translation.en: -that you're transgender… -Yeah.
translation.zh: 你是跨性别者

translation.en: …do they change at all in how they interact with you?
translation.zh: 这会改变他们和你互动的方式吗？

translation.en: Well, I… I do… I do think there are some assumptions
translation.zh: 我觉得在认识新人时

translation.en: when meeting new people completely about what my experience has been.
translation.zh: 他们确实对我的经历会有一些 自以为是的推测

translation.en: A big one that a lot of people have is,
translation.zh: 很多人都会觉得

translation.en: "Oh, so you were born a boy, but you want to be a girl."
translation.zh: “你生下来是个男孩 但你想做女孩”

translation.en: And how I see my experience is
translation.zh: 而我对自己的过去的解读是

translation.en: that I have always been female,
translation.zh: 我一直都是女性

translation.en: even… even when I was, you know, two and a half, and I had short hair,
translation.zh: 哪怕当我才两岁半 头发很短

translation.en: and people said "he," used male pronouns.
translation.zh: 人们会用男性代词指代我

translation.en: Um, I still see myself then as female, but I was assigned male at birth.
translation.zh: 我仍然觉得自己是女孩 只不过我在出生时被指定为男孩

translation.en: Based on that experience that you're describing,
translation.zh: 根据你描述的经验

translation.en: the character would have always known.
translation.zh: 角色本身一直都知道

translation.en: Yeah. I've… I've always known who I am.
translation.zh: 对 我一直都知道我是谁

translation.en: I've always been a girl.
translation.zh: 我一直是个女孩

translation.en: Why would he do that? I just wonder if there's another beat in here.
translation.zh: 他为什么要这么做？ 我感觉这里需要另一个动机

translation.en: [crew member] Do you like that?
translation.zh: 你喜欢吗？

translation.en: Stand by.
translation.zh: 待机

translation.en: -Thank you. -[crew member] Mark cue.
translation.zh: -谢谢 -马克入场

translation.en: [crew member] And set.
translation.zh: 就位

translation.en: Cameras are set. And… action!
translation.zh: 摄像就位 开始

translation.en: [kisses] For big ever.
translation.zh: 字幕翻译：阿黛拉
